greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of Sum_{k>=1} k * x^k/(1 - x^k)^3.
comment: Dirichlet convolution of natural numbers (A000027) with triangular numbers (A000217).
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: nmax = 55; CoefficientList[Series[Sum[k x^k/(1 - x^k)^3, {k, 1, nmax}], {x, 0, nmax}], x] // Rest
program: (PARI) my(N=66, x='x+O('x^N)); Vec(sum(k=1, N, binomial(k+1, 2)*x^k/(1-x^k)^2)) \\ _Seiichi Manyama_, Apr 19 2021
results.author: _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Aug 14 2019
